channel.title: Servers
channel.description:
I cant seem to get on most of the servers in the status list i go on 1 that says online but it says "Error connecting to server. Must be down Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own".
can anyone help me to connect to an online server

item.title: Servers
item.dc:creator: @zezuma zezuma
item.description:
@zezuma wrote:

when you click log in and it automaticly says “error connecting to server” that means they are currently updating. if it takes awile, it crashed or its down…

also dont look at the status list it doesn’t have ports so look at people’s threads in server advertisment

Read full topic

item.title: Servers
item.dc:creator: @ancientmage ancientmage
item.description:
@ancientmage wrote:

some servers might be updating and some people don’t put the port up or don’t put the right ip up use advertise server to find a server that is online or should be

Read full topic

Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own”.
